articles.description: This Tuesday, a New York judge officially gave the OK for the extradition of disgraced producer and convicted rapist Harvey Weinstein to face charges in Los Angeles. This came after Weinstein's team attempted to stall the transfer across the country,...
articles.content:
By Kayleigh Donaldson | Celebrity | June 16, 2021 | 
By Kayleigh Donaldson | Celebrity | June 16, 2021 |

articles.author: Lacey Rose
articles.title: “My Family Doesn’t Want to Be Overwhelmed by My Backside”: Regé-Jean Page, Chris Rock, John Boyega and the THR Drama Actor Roundtable - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: During the course of an hour in mid-May, five of the industry’s most talented actors, full-stop, convened for a conversation — part of The Hollywood Reporter‘s annual Emmy Roundtable series — that whipped between emotional and gut-busting with little warning.…
